reuters.title: MID-STATE <MSSL>, FIRST FEDERAL IN DEAL
reuters.body: Mid-State Federal Savings and Loan Association said it and First Federal Savings and Loan Association of Brooksville <FFBV> reached a definitive merger agreement. As previously announced, Brooksville shareholders will get cash and stock in exchange for their shares. The transaction is expected to be completed during the summer 1987. Reuter 
